snippet.title: Mariachi Legends - Official Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the reveal trailer for Mariachi Legends to see the characters and more from this upcoming action-packed mystery Metroidvania from Mexico-based developer Halberd Studios and publisher Freedom Games. In Mariachi Legends, Join fantastical festivities at the Day of the Dead carnival alongside Detective Pablo Cruz, currently masquerading as a mariachi player to investigate an evil curse looming over the serene town of Santa Mascota. Mariachi Legends will be available on PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG in 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerofGaming
